/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, their facades predominantly gray and brown, punctuated by occasional white and red accents. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Pedestrians can be seen as well, going about their day, contributing to the lively atmosphere. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape.
